alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 15 at 2:01PM CDT until March 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. North winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Valley and Sherman Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to start as rain that will transition to snow Thursday morning. Snow amounts will be on the lighter side, but strong winds will blow around anything that falls, reducing visibility. In addition, temperatures falling below freezing during the day may make surfaces very slick.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
